Params: {1: 'Fake Ascension', 2: 'Dark Reflections', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory279.png'}
{3: "With Alpha stuck with Roland, you carry Huaxu's key and swiftly leave the Core Area platform lift."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The Punishing Virus is highly concentrated up ahead. Let me treat your wounds here now.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll count on you.", 3: '500'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '(Nods) I got this.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv gently lifts your torn protective suit, disinfecting the cuts and applying medications on the wounds before bandaging your arm.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We'll need to fix your suit as well. We have more than enough supplies, so you can just replace the damaged parts.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Thanks to Bridget's generous offerings before you departed, you can save so much time swapping gears instead of repairing them."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Now, to put on the enhanced protective gears...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gotta carry that weight.', 3: '507'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The virus concentration ahead is lethal to you, after all.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv speedily attaches the required parts to the corresponding spots of your suit.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Alright, let's go.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Walking along the narrow passage, you enter a hollow cavern a few times larger than the structure above ground. Standing inside is an inconceivably gargantuan monster.'}
{2: 'Polyphage', 3: 'ROARRRR!'}
{3: 'Underneath this behemoth is a lake composed of the Red Tide, shimmering in its fearsome scarlet glow.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It must be the actual source of the Red Tide!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'They do have a trump card with them!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Based on our previous estimation, if this thing reaches the surface, Earth... no, even Babylonia won't survive its wrath!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We can't fight it alone. Let's ask for backup.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No, that would be unwise.', 3: '20'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Indeed. With how large its mass is, and with the Ascendants guarding along the path, I don't think any reinforcement can make it here in time.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "Maybe we can destroy it with a WMD before it leaves, but given how our signals are blocked here and how long the trip back to the surface is, it might be too late when it's ready.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Best we approach first, scouting a safe path of entry.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Nod) In that case, the reinforcement can arrive in safety.', 3: '26'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'How do we get near that thing?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Between the opening and the monster is a gap that completely cuts off any entry points, making the creature unapproachable.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'It can easily attack us when we move if we use our short-range jet engines.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's take a look around first.", 3: '33'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Understood. Let's move.", 4: '1'}
